dcterms:creator: MA Lebedev
Yu V Vizilter
OV Vygolov
VA Knyaz
A Yu Rubis
dcterms:description: The CDD dataset is widely used for change detection and contains 11 pairs of bi-temporal images obtained from Google Earth in different seasons, with a spatial resolution ranging from 3 to 100 cm per pixel. The dataset includes 10,000 image pairs for training, 3,000 for validation, and 3,000 for testing, featuring significant appearance variations due to seasonal changes.
dcterms:title: CDD

dcterms:creator: Shunping Ji
Shiqing Wei
Meng Lu
dcterms:description: The WHU Building Dataset focuses on changes in buildings and contains one pair of very high-resolution images taken in 2012 and 2016, with a spatial resolution of 0.075 m per pixel. The dataset is divided into a training set of 4,980 bi-temporal images and a testing set of 2,700 bi-temporal images, highlighting changes caused by construction and destruction.
dcterms:title: WHU Building Dataset
